text: Gienek Loska (; 8 January 1975 â€“ 9 September 2020) was a Belarusian-born Polish singer-songwriter and guitarist. He was born in Byelaazyorsk, Belarus. He won the first series of X Factor in 2011. Loska was the co-founder and longtime member of the blues-rock band Seven B. Loska died on 9 September 2020 in Byelaazyorsk from a stroke, aged 45. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish singer-songwriters
title: Gienek Loska
